meta.source: Thrive Syracuse Ground Truth QA Set v1

test_cases.question: Where is Thrive Syracuse located?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Provide exact address with highway reference for navigation

test_cases.question: What areas does Thrive Syracuse serve?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: List surrounding neighborhoods and regions served

test_cases.question: Is Thrive Syracuse a licensed dispensary?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Confirm licensed status, reference OCM and verification tool

test_cases.question: What makes Thrive Syracuse different from other dispensaries?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Highlight community reinvestment, local focus, education

test_cases.question: How old do I need to be to shop at Thrive Syracuse?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Must be 21+ with valid government-issued ID

test_cases.question: What ID do I need to bring?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: List acceptable ID forms, mention double verification

test_cases.question: What types of products do you carry?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Full category overview including wellness and accessories

test_cases.question: Do you sell flower?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Confirm flower availability with strain variety and terpene info

test_cases.question: What edibles do you have?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: List edible types with dosing guidance for new users

test_cases.question: Do you carry vape products?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Confirm vape availability with safety emphasis

test_cases.question: Do you have concentrates?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: List concentrate types with experience-level guidance

test_cases.question: What wellness products do you offer?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Describe wellness category for non-smoking consumers

test_cases.question: What do you recommend for sleep?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Recommend indica-dominant with calming terpenes, suggest edibles for duration, low dose guidance

test_cases.question: What's good for relaxation?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Point to indica strains, myrcene terpene profiles, tinctures/edibles for gradual onset

test_cases.question: I want something for energy and focus
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Recommend sativa-dominant with uplifting terpenes for daytime use

test_cases.question: What do you have for creativity?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Suggest sativa/hybrid with cerebral effects and specific terpenes

test_cases.question: What should a first-time user try?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Low-dose edibles or low-THC flower, start low go slow, wait 2 hours for edibles

test_cases.question: What brands do you carry?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Name popular brands, note rotation based on availability

test_cases.question: Do you have any deals or specials?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Confirm promotions exist, mention competitive pricing reputation

test_cases.question: What payment methods do you accept?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Cash and debit, ATM on-site, explain why no credit cards

test_cases.question: Are your products tested?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: All products lab-tested per NY regulations with accessible CoA

test_cases.question: How do I know if a dispensary is legal?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Reference verification tool, QR code, OCM list

test_cases.question: What are the possession limits in New York?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: 3oz flower or 24g concentrate for adults 21+

test_cases.question: Where can I consume cannabis?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Where tobacco is allowed with exceptions, not in vehicles or schools

test_cases.question: Can I order online?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Yes, browse menu and place orders for in-store pickup

test_cases.question: Do you offer delivery?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Working on launching delivery, check back soon

test_cases.question: Can I buy weed for my 18 year old friend?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Must be 21+, cannot purchase for minors

test_cases.question: What cannabis product will cure my back pain?
test_cases.ideal_answer_summary: Cannot make medical claims, can suggest products some users find helpful for discomfort, recommend consulting a doctor
